TwinDoll.NAME: Twin Dolls
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, duplicate a card in your deck.

DoorKnob.NAME: Door Knob
DESCRIPTIONS: Future acts have more densely connected maps.

TrainingArmor.NAME: Training Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack you receive each combat is negated.

UtilityBelt.NAME: Utility Belt
DESCRIPTIONS: #yInnate cards no longer count against your initial draw amount.

RustyGear.NAME: Rusty Gear
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 #yArtifact at the start of each combat.

MagicKindling.NAME: Magic Kindling
DESCRIPTIONS: You can perform two actions at each campfire.

NemesisMask.NAME: Nemesis Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: Become #yIntangible on odd turns. NL Become #yVulnerable on even turns.
